description: Try our easy to follow Cajun-Style Fried Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: CajunStyle Fried Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1 tbs salt, Cajun seasoning, paprika and pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle on chicken pieces and place on a large plate. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, or overnight if time permits.
Combine flour, cornflour and remaining salt in a large bowl. Whisk buttermilk and egg together in a large bowl. Coat chicken pieces with buttermilk then flour mixture and place on a tray.

Line a baking tray with baking paper and place a wire rack over paper. Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. When hot, cook chicken in batches for 10 minutes or until golden, crisp and cooked through. Transfer to tray. Serve with coleslaw and lime wedges.
